SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[UtentiTeams] ( [UtentiTeams_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [UtentiTeams_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [UtentiTeams_UserInsert] int NULL , [UtentiTeams_UserUpdate] int NULL , [UtentiTeams_UserDelete] int NULL , [UtentiTeams_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [UtentiTeams_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [UtentiTeams_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UtentiTeams] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_UtentiTeams PRIMARY KEY ([UtentiTeams_Ky])
